summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in block five (5), Pettit-Brown Lakeview Addition, and the alley as established by Ordinance No. 36586 through block one (1), C. P. Dose's Lake Washington Addition and unplatted strip adjoining, being the alley between Thirty-third Avenue South and Thirty-fourth Avenue South, and between Plum Street and Dose Terrace; all in the City of Seattle, all in accordance with Resolution No. 5627, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improving district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
